outputs.output_descr: The project seeks to increase environmental sustainability and sustainable development through environmental management, compliance with international treaties, adaptation to climate change and improvement in capacity for policy and strategy development through the conversion of polyurethane foam enterprises to low Global Warming Potential (GWP), non Ozone Depleting Substance (ODS) alternatives.

The project seeks to increase environmental sustainability and sustainable development through environmental management, compliance with international treaties, adaptation to climate change and improvement in capacity for policy and strategy development through the establishment of a Hydro-chlorofluorocarbons (HCFC) phase-out strategic plan to reduce Trinidad and Tobago's maximum allowable consumption of HCFC to 46.2 Ozone Depleting Potential tonnes by 2014.
